hook:
SHIP EVERYTHING. That was the mood this week.

39 PRs merged. Video, audio, and a complete platform redesign just went live.
body:
Open-source moves fast. We move faster. This week was not just about patching bugs — it was about expanding the definition of what developers can build with pollinations.ai.

We are seeing a shift from simple text-generation to full media synthesis, and our infrastructure is evolving to match that demand.

Here is what just shipped:

1. FULL MULTI-MODALITY
We integrated LTX-2 for next-gen video generation and ElevenMusic for high-fidelity audio. Combined with the new OVH Whisper integration for speech-to-text, the platform now handles the full creative lifecycle. Input text, output a movie.

2. UX OVERHAUL
Powerful models are useless if they are painful to use. We completely redesigned the frontend and merged our Docs directly into the Play page. Less tab switching, more building. The interface now gets out of your way.

3. AGENT INFRASTRUCTURE
We added the Polly Discord Bot and auto-onboarding for OpenClaw. We are building the rails for AI agents to not just generate content, but to navigate the web and manage their own resources.

4. MODEL EXPANSION
Added api.airforce models (Imagen 3 & Grok) and upgraded Claude to the latest Opus versions. We remain model-agnostic — if it is good, we support it.

The result? A platform that feels less like a sandbox and more like a production engine.

Go break the new UI.
